title: What is the status of the movie theater in Surf City?  The lot has been cleared for a while but there hasn\'t been any activity for some time.
text:
Here's a link to a story that includes information related to
your question.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110416/ARTICLES/110419738?p=all&tc=pgall



If it's true that construction hasn't started, it seems unlikely
that it will open in February.



I'm forwarding your question to one of the local news editors for
consideration. Should a story result, it will appear at
StarNewsOnline.com and in the StarNews.



Since
